name: P384.KeyAgreement.PublicKey
desc: A P-384 public key used for key agreement.

items.name: init<D>(rawRepresentation: D)
items.desc: Creates a P-384 public key for key agreement from a collection of bytes.

items.name: init<Bytes>(compactRepresentation: Bytes)
items.desc: Creates a P-384 public key for key agreement from a compact representation of the key.

items.name: init<Bytes>(derRepresentation: Bytes)
items.desc: Creates a P-384 public key for key agreement from a Distinguished Encoding Rules (DER) encoded representation.

items.name: init(pemRepresentation: String)
items.desc: Creates a P-384 public key for key agreement from a Privacy-Enhanced Mail (PEM) representation.

items.name: init<Bytes>(x963Representation: Bytes)
items.desc: Creates a P-384 public key for key agreement from an ANSI x9.63 representation.

items.name: var rawRepresentation: Data
items.desc: A full representation of the public key.

items.name: var compactRepresentation: Data?
items.desc: A compact representation of the public key.

items.name: var derRepresentation: Data
items.desc: A Distinguished Encoding Rules (DER) encoded representation of the public key.

items.name: var pemRepresentation: String
items.desc: A Privacy-Enhanced Mail (PEM) representation of the public key.

items.name: var x963Representation: Data
items.desc: An ANSI x9.63 representation of the public key.
